name: Firebase Defence
description: Firebase Defence is a new spin on the traditional tower defence gameplay. You have to defend yourself from the waves upon waves of incoming enemies. You are free to build, place and manage your available resources and units in any way you want. But failing to balance those will result in defeat!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
